Sentence.value: - Ventricular puncture may be recommended in people with possible brain herniation.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: - [[Ventricular puncture|C0844100]] may be recommended in [[people|C0027361]] with possible [[brain herniation|C0553686]].

Sentence.value: A hole is drilled in the skull, and a needle is inserted directly into one of the brain's ventricles.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: A [[hole|C0544726]] is drilled in the [[skull|C0037303]], and a needle is inserted directly into one of the brain's ventricles.

Sentence.value: Staying still is important because movement may lead to injury of the spinal cord.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: Staying still is important because movement may lead to [[injury|C0175677]] of the [[spinal cord|C0037925]].
